title.rendered: Important Tips when Filling out Applications

excerpt.rendered: Cory Minter, President of Bridge Careers Travel Agencies, goes into detail giving tips and advice when you’re filling out applications.  These will help you with a no-fail approach when it comes time for your next application to be filled out. Oh, and always bring a pen with you!
